soilStress.description: choice of function for the soil moisture control on stomatal resistance

stomResist.description: choice of function for stomatal resistance

bbTempFunc.description: Ball-Berry: leaf temperature controls on photosynthesis + stomatal resistance

bbHumdFunc.description: Ball-Berry: humidity controls on stomatal resistance

bbElecFunc.description: Ball-Berry: dependence of photosynthesis on PAR

bbCO2point.description: Ball-Berry: use of CO2 compensation point to calculate stomatal resistance

bbCanIntg8.description: Ball-Berry: scaling of photosynthesis from the leaf to the canopy

fDerivMeth.description: choice of method to calculate flux derivatives

LAI_method.description: choice of method to determine LAI and SAI

cIntercept.description: choice of parameterization for canopy interception

bcUpprTdyn.description: type of upper boundary condition for thermodynamics

bcLowrTdyn.description: type of lower boundary condition for thermodynamics

bcUpprSoiH.description: type of upper boundary condition for soil hydrology

bcLowrSoiH.description: type of lower boundary condition for soil hydrology

veg_traits.description: choice of parameterization for vegetation roughness length and displacement height

rootProfil.description: choice of parameterization for the rooting profile

canopyEmis.description: choice of parameterization for canopy emissivity

snowIncept.description: choice of parameterization for snow interception

snowUnload.description: choice of parameterization for snow unloading from canopy

snowLayers.description: choice of method to combine and sub-divide snow layers

thCondSnow.description: choice of thermal conductivity representation for snow

thCondSoil.description: choice of thermal conductivity representation for soil

canopySrad.description: choice of method for canopy shortwave radiation

spatial_gw.description: choice of method for spatial representation of groundwater

subRouting.description: choice of method for sub-grid routing

snowDenNew.description: choice of method for new snow density
